title: Rational design of an organometallic glutathione transferase inhibitor.
abstract_text: Double trouble: A hybrid organic-inorganic (organometallic) inhibitor was designed to target glutathione transferases. The metal center is used to direct protein binding, while the organic moiety acts as the active-site inhibitor (see picture). The mechanism of inhibition was studied using a range of biophysical and biochemical methods.
plain_text: Double trouble: A hybrid organic-inorganic (organometallic) inhibitor was designed to target glutathione transferases. The mechanism of inhibition was studied using a range of biophysical and biochemical methods.
